X.ii.6.A.5.c
.
Procedures Following Receipt of Court Decree Restoring Competency
Follow the guidance in
M21-1, Part X, Subpart ii, 6.D.2.i
to process a court decree of competency for a beneficiary previously held incompetent.
title: M21-1, Part X, Subpart ii, Chapter 6, Section A - Evaluating and Rating Competency
citation: Part X, Subpart ii, Chapter 6, Section A
